content.raw:
Some errors appeared in my system, don't know if it is a problem at my end ...

```
roslaunch atlas_utils atlas_v3_with_v1_inertia.launch
```
```
[ERROR] [1378830603.519046421]:     parent link 'l_situational_awareness_camera_frame' of joint 'l_situational_awareness_camera_optical_frame_joint' not found.  The Boxturtle urdf parser used to automatically add this link for you, but this is not valid according to the URDF spec. Every link you refer to from a joint needs to be explicitly defined in the robot description. To fix this problem you can either remove this joint from your urdf file, or add "<link name="l_situational_awareness_camera_frame" />" to your urdf file.
[ERROR] [1378830603.519162124]: failed to build tree
[ERROR] [1378830603.520199491]: Could not generate robot model
[ERROR] [1378830603.520244055]: Failed to extract kdl tree from xml robot description
```

Some errors appeared in my system, don't know if it is a problem at my end ...

roslaunch atlas_utils atlas_v3_with_v1_inertia.launch

[ERROR] [1378830603.519046421]:     parent link 'l_situational_awareness_camera_frame' of joint 'l_situational_awareness_camera_optical_frame_joint' not found.  The Boxturtle urdf parser used to automatically add this link for you, but this is not valid according to the URDF spec. Every link you refer to from a joint needs to be explicitly defined in the robot description. To fix this problem you can either remove this joint from your urdf file, or add "<link name="l_situational_awareness_camera_frame" />" to your urdf file.
